offset.label: Offset
offset.help: Position the element below the viewport edge

top.label: Top
top.help: Apply the sticky behavior with a delay e.g. in pixels or viewport height

showOnUp.label: Show on up
showOnUp.help: Make the sticky element show only when scrolling up to.

media.label: Media
media.help: Condition for the active status - a width as integer (e.g. 640) or a breakpoint (e.g. @s, @m, @l, @xl) or any valid media query (e.g. (min-width: 900px)).
